channel.title: Greengrocer on Grocery Stories
channel.description: Recent content in Greengrocer on Grocery Stories

item.title: The start: Barbur World Foods
item.description: A good grocery store tells you something about the community in which it’s situated. Every shop carries a version of the basics: fresh produce, grains, soft drinks, canned goods, and snacks. But maybe the owners are Lebanese or Korean or Indian and so you’ll find, based on their cultural and culinary backgrounds, goods the owners see as essential on the shelves as well. At the same time, owners stock their stores according to the needs and desires of people who live in the vicinity.
